My Expertise

I am Md adnanul Chowdhury, a web developer with experience in front-end and back-end technologies. I come from a Mechanical Engineering background with concentration in robotics. When I am not coding, I work as a full-time Uber driver in Big Apple, and ponder about the expansion of the universe.
